architectural_notes: Profile data/schema update must be backward-compatible: existing users keep data; PIN can be added via profile update (no re-registration required).

existing_features.title: Re-add PIN section to the existing Profile page UI so users can create a PIN (if none exists) or update their PIN (if already set) directly from the Profile page, without requiring re-onboarding or re-registration.

new_feature_requests.summary: Re-add PIN field to user Profile and allow existing users to set/update PIN without losing existing account data; keep other features unaffected

Expose a backend API to let the frontend determine whether the caller has a PIN set, without returning the PIN value, so existing users can set/update a PIN via their existing account profile without re-registering.

projectName: Re-add PIN management to Profile page without affecting existing users
